channel.title: Running server and playing it on same ip 525
channel.description: hi, im running my server off my laptop and its connected to my computer wirlessly. but i cnt get someone to use the client on my computer with the no-ip, 127.0.0.1, or 0.0.0.0 please help me with the ip

item.title: Running server and playing it on same ip 525
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

my advice would be to just get a no-ip and utorrent and get your server online and do it that way instead of locally.

Read full topic
